title: Anomaly Detection
subject: Machine Learning
theory:
Finding the needle in the haystack. 
Normal data follows a pattern. Anomalies do not. 
Used when anomalies are too rare to train a classifier.

interview_questions.question: Why not Classification for Fraud?
interview_questions.answer: Fraud is 0.001% of data. Extreme imbalance makes standard classifiers fail. Anomaly detection learns 'Normal' and flags 'Weird'.

real_world_use_cases.description: Your card used in another country? Anomaly.
